params.text:
Rework README for the Issue project

The fact that Krzysztof Franek will become an active user of the Issue
issue tracking tool means that I need a better README. It should
include:

- a FAQ with examples of common commands
- a manual with examples of less common commands

It may optionally include an explanation section describing the concepts
and ideas behind the design of Issue; how is distribution managed, how
it is possible that different users may modify an issue, how are the
changes merged (i.e. what happens during indexing), etc.

This is all needed because we decided to use Issue as the issue tracking
tool for the compiler part of the Viuact project.
